Stefan,

Failed assumptions _should_ be treated as ignored.  Unfortunately,=
 at
the time assumptions were released, Eclipse had bad behavior if a test
=
method was first started, and then ignored, so I rolled back this
change at=
 the last minute, without updating the documentation.  Please
remind me unt=
il this is fixed.

   David Saff

On Wed, Jul 1, 2009 at 3:12 PM, stefan_lu=
n<stefan_lun@...> wrote:
> Hi!
> I read from the documentation that fa=
iled assumptions should be reported as ignored test cases but when I'm tryi=
ng to use them my test cases are passed though failed assumptions.
>
> In w=
hat way should they behave?
> In junit code it's stated as they should pass=
 which I think is incorrect.
> See Result.java:testAssumptionFailure.
>
> C=
ould anyone clarify on this please.
> /Stefan
>
> additional note, I've rea=
d some posts that assumptions work
> in my expected way when used in before=
class. But all doc says
> that it should be usable on individual test cases=
 too.
